boardgame.description: Designer Eric Lang, known for his _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;dudes on a map_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; games, describes The Godfather: Corleone's Empire _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; a standalone big box board game with high-quality miniatures _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;thugs on a map_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In short, the game is a streamlined, confrontational worker placement game filled with murder and intrigue. You play as competing mafia families who are vying for economic control of the organized crime networks of New York City, deploying your thugs, your don, your wife, and your heir on the board to shake down businesses and engage in area-control turf wars._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Money, rackets, contracts, and special advantages (such as the union boss) are represented by cards in your hand, and your hand size is limited, with you choosing which extra cards to pay tribute to the don at the end of each of the five rounds. At the end of the game, though, cash is all that matters, and whoever has the most money wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game also features drive-by shootings in which enemy tokens are removed from the board and placed face-down in the river._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

(A $45+ value on Amazon!) This game has only been played once and is in excellent condition. All of the original cards and game pieces are present and accounted for.

Complete and in excellent condition. One deck of cards is out of the shrink wrap and in a bag - everything else is as-new. Shipping within the U.S. will be by the least expensive USPS priority mail option unless otherwise noted or arranged. USPS insurance will be used on all shipments worth more than $100 and is optional on others. Payment can be made by PayPal or by Amazon eGift card. If you want to pay by PayPal and prefer to get a formal PayPal invoice before paying let me know and I will send you one. I will happily combine shipping on multiple items.
